oswin.name: Oswin
oswin.title: Impregnable Knight
oswin.description: An armored knight of Ostia. He accompanies Hector on his journey under the strict orders of Hector's older brother Uther, marquess of Ostia. Appears in Fire Emblem: The Blazing Blade.

Castle Hall: I am a knight in service to Castle Ostia. Until now, I have only offered my lance to Lord Uther. Yet...
Lord Uther was worried about Lord Hector traveling alone. I have been ordered to keep a close eye on him.
You must not rely so much on physical strength alone.
Lord Hector and Lord Eliwood are on the front line. If we, their retainers, do not help them, then what are we?
Lord Hector, hate me and scorn me as you will, but...please do not doubt Lord Uther's intentions.
Visit: This is a gift for you, entrusted to me by [F].
Level: We can use our thick armor to form a living shield.
I will guard him with my very life's blood.
Summon: I am Oswin. If the goal is to defend, we knights are your best hope.
Learn Skill: I shall meet your expectations no matter what may come.
Confession:
It is my duty to protect Marquess Ostia's younger brother, Lord Hector.
However, he is not easy to protect, for he does not walk a clear path of his own volition.
By not walking the clear path, he always forges new ones. Those are the paths he is apt to choose.
By his very nature he walks an unpaved road, after which a paved one is forged behind him.
He may be beyond blunt, and it may stir conflict, but... I have come to hope he does not lose that trait.
Status: I am Oswin. I've been ordered to keep a close eye on Lord Hector.
Huh?! So, even you take part in this kind of mischief.
No matter what Lord Uther says, he's just worried about Lord Hector.
Hmm... I cannot condone resorting to force so quickly...
If the goal is to defend, knights are your best hope. We can use our armor to form a living shield.
Lord Uther... I will guard Lord Hector with my very life's blood.
I wish to offer you my service. Please grant me that honor.
